summary:
There are 50 Spells (Sky Shooting + Normal Spell) of New 7 texture colors
for Icy Spear, The 7 Elements : Venom (Green), Fang (Red), Flame (Yellow),
Freez (White), Bolt (Blue), Soul (Dark), and Icy Goddess (Rainbow).
If you like a challange, you can also use optional file for NPC, so NPC have
the same ability with you.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=2]Hello Guys, Finaly i uploading My first mod but its still beta and many things for improving this mod.
Actually my english is verry poor, so forgive me before :([/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][COLOR=red][B]New ADD on for your NPC[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]if you want some NPC in skyrim have the same ability and make your game more challange, you can download the second main file "Advance Skyrim - Icy 7 Elements" [/SIZE]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/readmes/Advance%20Icy%20Spear%20-%20The%207%20Elements_readme.txt][COLOR=red][B][SIZE=3]README[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][/url]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=#4bacc6][B]Electromancer using Icy Bolt :[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/95501932@N03/8823399070/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7388/8823399070_dde0fd7ab0_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=green][B]Bandit mage using Icy Venom :[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/95501932@N03/8823414242/][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2855/8823414242_e91882861a_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=#4bacc6][B]and more, you can see at readme.txt for list NPC that have Advance Icy Spear spell ability in Advance Skyrim - Icy 7 Elements mod.[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#4bacc6][B]New Update 1.8[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=All Sky Shooting Mode Spell is move from Distruction to Alteration exept target mode and normal spell[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Add slowmotion effect when realise spell sky shooting mode.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Add Console Command for spell if you have problem when buy spell from Farengar. I have put it in Optional File[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=fix Sting Flame Protections projectile[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=All spells will be casted by Right Hand only exept Normal Spell and Target Mode
i doing this because i found some sound glitch when casting in dual hand.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#4bacc6][B]New Update 1.7[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Since the mod have bug when purchasing spell with Farengar in Whithrun,
i decrease spell and focusing all spell to the 7 elements of Icy Spear[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Fix for reduce time[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Average spell now in balance mode[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Fix Icy Rainbow delay and bug[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#4bacc6][B]New Update 1.6[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Reduce time for Sky Shooting Spell[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Increas time when casting Normal Spell[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Slowmotions effect when using dual cast for Normal Spell[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Fix Texture color for Icy Fang[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Fix Bug when using Sky Shooting - Arrow Storm, Venoz, and Gatling Icy[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=Reduce damage each sky shooting spell[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=i still not change effect that will send enemy fly when got hit,[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]because if i change the effect, hostile will faster to die because the will often get directly hit from projectile.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]=I will plan and launch some spell will used by some hostile, so be aware!! >:)[/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]Element of Icy Spear : Icy Goddess : The Rainbow[/SIZE]
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/95501932@N03/8730950945/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7405/8730950945_19228536e4_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[SIZE=2]-The Rainbow - TM : Chain all shooting sky from 6 element in shot one by one.
if you success and make a lucky shot or impact your enemy with 6 elements of icy spear,
the icy rainbow will falling down to shooting all of your enemy.
you must directing your target to get hit with your chain of six element from sky.
you must have skill and consentration for that ;)[/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]
Icy Soul (Dark Element) Priview:[/SIZE]
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/95501932@N03/8725835419/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7400/8725835419_5ee8bab372_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[SIZE=2]5 Element for Ice Spear Spell[/SIZE]
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/95501932@N03/8722912703/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7434/8722912703_2b26bb491c_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[SIZE=2][COLOR=#FF0000]Fang (Red)[/COLOR], Freez (White), [COLOR=#FFFF00]Sting (Yellow)[/COLOR], [COLOR=#00B050]Venom (Green)[/COLOR], [COLOR=#00B0F0]and Bolt (Blue)[/COLOR]
[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#00B050][B][SIZE=5]Advance Icy Spear - The 7 Elements[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]This Is icy spear that have changed the color base. There are 7 new element of icy spear for the spell[ including deferent effect.[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#00B050][B][SIZE=5]SPELL SPECIFICATIONS[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Random Area : Mini (30ft), Normal (60ft), Berserk (150ft), Evil (300ft) => random targeted Sky Shooting Spell
Target Mode : Sky Shooting Spell will hit targeted enemy
Normal hand : Normal spell aimed[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#00B050][B][SIZE=5]NOTE FOR SPELL[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Outdoor only for sky shooting mode(you cannot using this spell in indoor area)[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#00B050][B][SIZE=5]RIQUIREMENTS FOR INSTALLATION[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Skyrim patch minimum 1.8.151.0
Dawnguard DLC (Dragonborn + Hearthfile is a plus)
[/SIZE]
[B][COLOR=#00B050][SIZE=5]SPELL LIST[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[B][COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=4]Normal Hand Spells[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=#FF0000][B][SIZE=3]Master 100 =>[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Sting Flame Protection
Icy Freez :Freez effect
Icy Sting :Flame effect
Icy Bolt :Bolt effect
Icy Venom :Venom effect
Icy Fang :Absorb health effect
Icy Soul :Soul trap and reanimate effect[/SIZE]
[B][COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=4]Sky Shooting Target Mode[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=#FF0000][B][SIZE=3]Adept 50 =>[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Sting Flame - Target Mode
Soul Spear - Target Mode
Venoz - Target Mode
Piercing Bolt - Target Mode
Night Fang - Target Mode
Sky Gatling Ice - Target Mode
Arrow Storm - Target Mode[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#FF0000][B][SIZE=3]Master 100 =>[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]The Rainbow - Target Mod[/SIZE]
[B][COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=4]Sky Shooting Random Area Mode[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[B][COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=3]Adept 50 =>[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[SIZE=2]Arrow Storm - Mini : Radius 30ft
Night Fang - Mini : Radius 30ft
Sting Flame - Mini : Radius 30ft
Venoz - Mini : Radius 30ft
Night Terror - Mini : Radius 30ft
Piercing Bolt - Mini : Radius 30ft
Sky Gatling Ice - Mini : Radius 30ft
Soul Spear - Mini : Radius 30ft
Arrow Storm : Radius 60ft
Night Fang : Radius 60ft
Sting Flame : Radius 60ft
Venoz : Radius 60ft
Piercing Bolt : Radius 60ft
Sky Gatling Ice : Radius 60ft
Soul Spear : Radius 60ft[/SIZE]
[B][COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=3]Expert 75 =>[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[SIZE=2]Arrow Storm - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft
Night Fang - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft
Sting Flame - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft
Venoz - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft
Piercing Bolt - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft
Sky Gatling Ice - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft
Soul Spear - Berserk mode : Radius 150ft[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=3][B]Master 100 =>[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Arrow Storm - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
Night Fang - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
Sting Flame - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
Venoz - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
Piercing Bolt - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
Sky Gatling Ice - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
Soul Spear - Evil mode : Radius 300ft
[/SIZE]

[B][COLOR=#00B050][SIZE=5]INSTALLATIONS[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[SIZE=2]just extract the files and move to your skyrim directory and then active that mod in Skyrim Launcher. For uninstall just delete esp and bsa file then make clean save in your game.[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#00B050][B][SIZE=5]HOW TO GET SPELL[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2]Just buy it from Farengar in Whitrun Dragonsreach. If you have problem when by spell from Farengar, you can use console cammand to add spell. The code for spell is in Optional File.[/SIZE]

[B][COLOR=#00B050][SIZE=5]Next Spell, WIP[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[SIZE=2]Icy Soul Trap
Icy Fang Trap[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]
Thanks to Bathesda for making a great games :D
Thanks for nexus skyrim :D
[/SIZE][SIZE=4]
If anyone finding some bug/glitch, let me to know, any recomendation and sugestion will improve this mod as well :)
If you like my mod, please endorse me :)
I hope you enjoy my Spell :)[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=5]Thanks,[/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT]
author: 8990gilang

files.name: Sky Shooting Spell - New Spell and Fix bug
files.fileName: Sky Shooting Spell - New Spell and Fix bug-35803-1-4.rar
files.changelogHtml:
New Update 1.4
New Element => Final Element of Icy Spear : Icy Goddess : The Rainbow
add 5 spells Sky Shooting Spell - Target Mode
-Arrow Storm - TM
-Night Fang - TM
-Piercing Bolt - TM
-Sky Gatling Ice - TM
-The Rainbow - TM : Chain all shooting sky from 6 element in shot one by one.
if you success and make a lucky shot or impact your enemy with 6 elements of icy spear,
the icy rainbow will falling down to shooting all of your enemy.
you must directing your target to get hit with your chain of six element from sky.
you must have skill and consentration for that ;)
-Fix yellow Icy Spear Bug
-Add effect bat for Icy fang and Night fang
